h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
content: As mentioned, one of the options is to challenge Yin Tiger, which will end up in an intense fight between the two of you. It can be a tough battle, especially as he uses both wind and fire and performs a range of heavy attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'Challenge Yin Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
As mentioned, one of the options is to challenge Yin Tiger, which will end up in an intense fight between the two of you. It can be a tough battle, especially as he uses both wind and fire and performs a range of heavy attacks.
